summary: A woman and her childhood friend seek out revenge on those who victimized and abused them.
cast: Troian Bellisario|Bailey Noble|Kate Burton|Caitlin Carmichael|Melissa Tracy|Romy Rosemont|Toby Huss|Elyse Cole|Ever Prishkulnik|Blake Robbins|Taylor John Smith|Lexi DiBenedetto|Ivar Brogger|Laurence Todd Rosenthal|DaJuan Johnson|Michael McCarthy|Matthew Jaeger|Rob Wood|Max Acosta-Rubio|Sara Zanelletti|Brianna Bazler|Carissa Bazler|Rebecca Ellen Evans|Peter Michael Goetz|Diana Hopper|Edwin Modlin II|Eve Nigro|Marguerite Nocera|Karly Rothenberg|Jordyne Visser|Jennimay Walker|Boriana Williams
title: Martyrs
